name: ext-openssl-c
description: OpenSSL bindings: hashes, RNG, and Ed25519 (run-os only).
docs:
OpenSSL bindings: hashes, RNG, and Ed25519 (run-os only).

Modules:
- ext.openssl._ffi
- ext.openssl.ed25519
- ext.openssl.rand
- ext.openssl.hash

FFI libs:
- ssl
- crypto

Usage:
- Add dependency: x07 pkg add ext-openssl-c@0.1.6
- Import the modules listed above.
